channel.title: Ethereum on Eric Khun

item.title: Setup you own Etheureum node with geth on the Ropsten test network
item.description: This is a step by step guide to setup your own Ethereum node on the Ropsten network. At the end of this guide you’ll be able to: Run your own ethereum node synced with the Ropsten testnet network Making sure to keep your node in sync with your the network Be able to communicate via the JSON-RPC API of your own node Why ? Once your dAPP and Smart Contract are working locally, you’ll want to test it on a real network with (almost) real condition.
